org.apache.solr.analytics.accumulator.facet

Class FieldFacetAccumulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.SimpleCollector
      • org.apache.solr.analytics.accumulator.ValueAccumulator
        • org.apache.solr.analytics.accumulator.facet.FieldFacetAccumulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collector, LeafCollector

    public class FieldFacetAccumulator
extends ValueAccumulator
    An Accumulator that manages the faceting for fieldFacets. Collects the field facet values.
